description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability associated with the Windows WLAN AutoConfig service (CVE-2024-38143):

1. Download the appropriate update for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system meets the following build numbers before applying the updates:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.1457
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4037
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64: 10.0.19045.4780
3. Install the updates and restart your system to finalize the installation.

**Details**:
- The updates address a critical vulnerability that may allow malicious actors to elevate privileges and execute arbitrary code on the affected systems.
- Relevant KB Articles:
  - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
  - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of any updates.
